players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and he killed Alice. We need to act fast."
You: "Charlie is the detective and he will find out that I am not the mafioso."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I will investigate tonight to find out who the mafioso is. Please stay alert."
Diana: "I will investigate tonight to confirm if Bob is indeed the mafioso. Stay vigilant, everyone."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
